name: Jumpy (GRP Software)
description:
Jumpy is an action platform skill game that resembles Doodle Jump, featuring fast and addictive gameplay.

Your task is to reach the castle which is located at the height of 40 kilometers.

It is a J2ME (Java ME) game, so you'll need a cell phone (Symbian or J2ME) to play it.

Tested on real hardware: Nokia C3-00, Nokia E63, Nokia E71, Nokia E72, Nokia X2-01, Nokia 5310 XpressMusic.

Resolutions available: 320x240 and 240x320.

If you liked it please consider making a donation and help me create more quality games. Thank you very much!
